meanings.definition: The act or process of filtering.
meanings.sent1: I watched the filtrations of the coffee to remove the grounds.
meanings.sent2: The water pitcher had a built-in filtration system to purify the water.
meanings.sent3: The filtrations of the air in the room made it feel fresher instantly.
meanings.sent4: Her mind went through a filtration process, sieving out unnecessary thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The filtration of ideas in the brainstorming session helped focus on the main topic.

meanings.definition: A device or material used for filtering.
meanings.sent1: The filtration in the fish tank kept the water clean for the fish.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new filtration for her vacuum cleaner to trap more dust.
meanings.sent3: The filtration in the coffee maker looked like a tiny net catching particles.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as a filtration, letting only truth pass through.
meanings.sent5: The filtration in the car engine prevented dirt from damaging the components.

meanings.sent1: The filtrations of the tea leaves created a clear and aromatic brew.
meanings.sent2: After the filtration, the oil was free of impurities and ready for use.
meanings.sent3: The filtration of the photos made them look more professional and polished.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a filtration, showing only happiness and hiding worries.
meanings.sent5: The filtration of the data revealed interesting patterns and trends.
